name: Lights Out (itch) (garbageio)
description:
Puzzle game where the goal is to get everyone into bed with all of the lights turned off.  There are two types of lights: lamps and switches. Lamps are turned on/off by walking into them and switches are turned on/off by the green crosses.  Windows will let light through but not you.  Switches will take a second to turn on so you can press "C" to wait or keep pressing the switch. 10 levels to beat.

Made in puzzlescript.
